pr_title: Fixes for map handling in Protobuf plugin

timeline.message: Ensure map entries are generated last
Add format query param to get by id

timeline.bodyText:
I think it might be a bit nicer to have another overload for the default format: 'text' (in addition to empty or null).
In the clients, I feel like I want an enum for specifying this: SchemaFormat.Text/Serialized. Less flexible structure than a string, but I don't feel it'll ever be too limiting?
timeline.author: mhowlett

replies.bodyText: I was also thinking of possibly having a pretty-print option as well, in the future.
replies.author: rayokota
